sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import '../../assets/css/body.css'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import Banner from './Banner'; import IconMenu from './IconMenu'; import img1 from '../../assets/img/home/banner1.png'; import img2 from '../../assets/img/home/banner2.png'; import img3 from '../../assets/img/home/banner3.png'; import img4 from '../../assets/img/home/banner4.png'; import bannerimg from '../../assets/img/shop-info-bg.jpg'; import storeIcon from '../../assets/img/icons/store-icon.png'; import saleIcon from '../../assets/img/icons/sale-icon.png'; import facebookIcon from '../../assets/img/icons/facebook-icon.png'; import searchIcon from '../../assets/img/icons/search-icon.png'; import toyIcon from '../../assets/img/icons/toy-icon.png'; import penIcon from '../../assets/img/icons/pen-icon.png'; import bookIcon from '../../assets/img/icons/book-icon.png'; import childIcon from '../../assets/img/icons/child-icon.png'; import simpsonIcon from '../../assets/img/icons/simpson-icon.png'; import mindIcon from '../../assets/img/icons/mind-icon.png'; const banners = [ {img:img1, link:'/shop'}, {img:img2, link:'/shop'}, {img:img3, link:'/shop'}, {img:img4, link:'/shop'} ]; const icons = [ {img: storeIcon, caption: 'Cua hang', link: '/shop'}, {img: saleIcon, caption: 'Sale', link: '/shop'}, {img: searchIcon, caption: 'Goi y', link: '/shop'}, {img: facebookIcon, caption: 'facebuck', link: '/shop'}, {img: toyIcon, caption: 'Do choi', link: '/shop'}, {img: penIcon, caption: 'Van phong pham', link: '/shop'}, {img: bookIcon, caption: 'Van hoc', link: '/shop'}, {img: childIcon, caption: 'Thieu nhi', link: '/shop'}, {img: simpsonIcon, caption: 'Tam ly ki nang', link: '/shop'}, {img: mindIcon, caption: 'Kinh te', link: '/shop'}, ]; class Body extends Component { render(){ return (
    {banners.map((banner, i) => { return })}
    {icons.map((icon, i) => { return })}
